title: Ranked Que times way to long
body:
Hello All

Some times I find my self waiting, 10, 20 some times 30minutes to play a ranked game.

I think that is way to much wait time. Is any one else experiencing this? 

The new system is great! but how it finds team may need to be looked at.

replies.body:
Hey

Yeah I'm noticing this alot and it makes it harder to find time to play ranked when you need to add in the long waits and queue dodging...
I used to play on EUW and moved my account to OCE to benefit from a lower ping but it has effectively killed competitive league for me... RITO, please!
Yeah and its worse at higher ranks. It's also only going to get worse as old players stop playing. Though if que times bother you that much i suggest picking fill.
